name: DashPanel - Codemasters Full Data
detailed_description:
Unlock full data for Codemasters F1 2012, F1 2013, F1 2014, F1 2015, F1 2016, F1 2017, F1 2018, Dirt Rally, Dirt 4.

NOTE:
Purchasing Steam DLC gives you access to full data on the Windows version of DashPanel ONLY!!
If you wish to access full data on Android or iOS devices purchase the full data unlocks within the DashPanel application on the desired platform.

short_description: Unlock full data for Codemasters F1 2012, F1 2013, F1 2014, F1 2015, F1 2016, F1 2017, Dirt Rally, Dirt 4. The demo version provides Speed, RPM and Gear purchase this DLC to unlock full data.
legal_notice: DashPanel is not official software of Codemasters™. The names are used for identification purposes only. All trademarks and registered trademarks are the property of their respective owners.
